title: Bill Ackman: I bought 2M shares of Valeant today; I believe in the company
text: From cnbc.com Hedge fund manager Bill Ackman said Wednesday that he purchased an additional 2 million shares of Valeant Pharmaceuticals as the stock plunged following the release of an explosive note from Citron Research that alleges the drugmaker is channel stuffing. Ackman told CNBC that he believes in the company despite Citron claims. His firm, Pershing Square, was already one of the largest holders of Valeant stock.
